title: Inflation rate in Costa Rica 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 2000 to 2001, slightly decreasing from 2001 to 2002, roughly constant from 2002 to 2003, slightly increasing from 2003 to 2004, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2004 to 2007.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2003 and 2004.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 13.79 was reached at Year 2005
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 9.17 was reached at Year 2002
min_summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
